reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and flattering, particularly noting how it hugs the body beautifully without feeling tight.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Fit & Super Flattering!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress surprised me in the best way! The material is soft, stretchy, and hugs the body beautifully without feeling tight. The built-in shapewear is a game changer—super comfortable and gives a smooth, snatched look without any squeezing. It’s perfect for date nights, events, or even content creation because it photographs so well. I felt confident, supported, and stylish the entire time I wore it. Definitely worth it! If you’re looking for a flattering maxi dress that shapes you naturally and feels good on the skin, this one is a must-buy. Read more
items.author: Lakshmy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite dress
items.body: Loved this dress, I felt amazing all night. It was comfortable, did a fantastic job shaping, was stretchy, and looks expensive. 10/10 Read more
items.author: Jacob & Lyndsey Bowers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: I ordered a medium. 5’7 , athletic, large breasts. It was extremely flattering. I have a wider rib cage and back so the top part felt a little tight for comfort for me. I don’t like anything digging into my back at all. Next time I think I’ll try the large esp as I’ve built more muscle since the time these pictures were taken. Regardless, the color and fit was beautiful. I looked snatched for my elopement photos, which is what I wanted. And it was mostly comfortable. 10/10. I will say the leg part is noticeable through the fabric, as well as some other parts, but it didn’t detract from the beauty of the dress and it could be because I needed a size larger. Read more
items.author: Krishna Brownlee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress, overpriced
items.body: I generally like the dress! It definitely smooths things out, and I didn't notice the sound issue everyone was having with it. The only thing I'll say is, the price is a little insane. I expected a bit more for it. It's a great "black dress" for any occasion, so it'll get use. Read more
items.author: Angela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: This is a great dress, the fabric is soft and stretchy. The shape wear is actually really good. I am 5’7 and it hits right at the top of my ankle. I wear a 38 DDD and I am decently held up. Enough that I feel comfortable wearing it with no bra, but if you want more lift you could easily put a bra on under the shape wear. I feel it is true to size. I wear a size 16 pants and am very hourglass shaped, I got the XL and it fits perfectly. The shape wear takes some patience getting into but once I worked it up and got it in place it was extremely comfortable, smoothing and slimming. I would have someone help you if you have long nails to get it over hips. Read more
items.author: Corrin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress
items.body: Updated Review: I gave a 3 star from a 4 just because of the shape wear material. I did re-buy the dress and an XL was perfect but, you guessed it, the butt ripped on me again. I still stand by the shape wear material needing an overhaul as it is really uncomfortable on the bottom part. The boob pads need to go. Still a super flattering dress. Initial review: So, I have to say I love this dress but… literally butt, the shape wear ripped in the butt. That should not happen as that material needs to be durable, especially if you have a large bum! The shape wear is very thin and scratchy and rubs on the thighs. I think the mesh needs to be thicker. I’m around 200 5’6 and I tried the large, it fit decent except for the butt rip, so I am going to try sizing up and see if that helps as I may have just bought it too small. Can’t wait to get another one. I do suggest wearing some type of protective thigh cream, or a deodorant on the thighs as it does cause some discomfort from the type of thin pantyhose type material. Overall I think this is a beautiful dress but, the design on shape wear needs work, in particular upgrading the material making it thicker and smoother. Read more
items.author: Mia Fraser

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Full BODY yum.
items.body: Okay, too to bottom absolutely more than what I was expecting. The inner shape wear, bra top with padding. Gives enough support in my opinion, I have a d chest so I think for what the dress is it gave me enough lift and hold. The shape wear holds enough, gives that seamless look however this is not what you lean on for that snatched support but in my opinion it’s fine, if I want more support I add whatever shape wear I already own either under or over and it works out just fine it has the gusset to make ease of restroom use. Now the dress itself, sleeves are long enough, and when I say enough I mean enough for me it stops about wrist bone but the stretch give me at least an extra inch and it doesn’t exhaust the fabric it is a stretch and bounce back material. And when I pull the sleeves it has enough give where it doesn’t pull the body of the dress and make it obvious you are stretching it. The length of the dress is great and it fits just so that you can manipulate and scrunch the dress to cover your pooch or even to ‘shorten’ it. It’s extremely stretchy dress and is great for lounging or out. The shape wear inside is comfortable to wear as an at home lazy dress and still feel cute. Love love love this dress, going to purchase this in all styles and colors. Read more
items.author: Luv Powell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful dress
items.body: Very comfy. I'm 5'5 and its long but I like the length. The built-in shapewear will smooth you out but won't make your tummy disappear you will need additional corest for that but I don't care that much for a little belly it looks more natural. With that said peeing in it was easy maybe more hygienic cause your butt doesn't touch the toilet seat but the pee hole opens up huge so no accidental peeing on your clothes. I got lots of compliments on the color. I wore the color green. To be honest I own the black too for some odd reason I think these dresses really make a statement as color that's nit black. But I'm black so maybe it's a me problem. Lol. I will buy this again in other colors so I switch it up and have fun. Test your bra first. I wore a full coverage bra by mistake and it kept shoeing through the square neck. I had to keep adjusting. Please test the perfect bra before you go out cause all the adjust in the world if you got big boobs like me... listen your bra will show. But I have better bras for this dress and now I know. Read more
items.author: Tamika M Reynolds

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Bodycon Maxi Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Bodycon Maxi Cocktail Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Pink, Blue, Purple, Black, Green, Grey, Dark Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
